title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia            Historic Artwork See images of historic artwork created during the Weir period, the Weir-Young period, and the Andrews period of residencies here.           Visitor Artwork The tradition of artists being inspired by the landscape of Weir Farm dates back more than 130 years. The park service continues to promote artistic inspiration with the Take Part in Art program. Here are some of the results.           Photo Galleries  View  present day images of the park or see historic photographs; taken by the Weir, Young, Andrews, and Bass families that once called Weir Farm their home.           Multimedia Presentations View a wide variety of videos about Weir Farm National Historic Site. Learn about the park by watching the 13-minute park film, discover fun winter activities at Weir Farm National Historic Site, and see the Park Rangers creating art using our Take Part in Art supplies.           Social Media Weir Farm National Historic Site has gone social! Stay connected with the park through Facebook and Instagram. Join our online community!
